descriptionHtml:
[color=#76a5af][size=3][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74308-0-1458482787.png[/img]
[color=#b6d7a8][size=3]Credit to [color=#b4a7d6][b]Jokerine[/b][/color] for the Forever Free! logo, download from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/58832/?]here.[/url][/size][/color][color=#b6d7a8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#b6d7a8]
[/color][/size][/color][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][size=5]Helgi is back,[/size] walking around in her resurrected home![/size] Take a look at the new image :-)
I don't know why this happens but I am glad Helgi is back in her resurrected home. What a beautiful idea. Thanks Bethesda!![/color][color=#76a5af][size=3][color=#b6d7a8][size=5][size=4]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tribute to Helgi - Player Home[/size][/size]
Had such emotions for Helgi's situation that I had to do something to honor her (A fab idea from Bethesda's part).
The tropicals are not included in this mod. [b]Soolie's 'Tropical Skyrim'[/b] mod can be downloaded [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]here[/url].
Remember to credit him and donate if that suits you.

Other authors:
-The flowering bushes are from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22018/?]Tamira's "New Plants"[/url]

Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for creating wonderous games.
Thanks to my friends on the nexusmods.
[/color][/size][/color][color=#b6d7a8]
[/color]
author: fredlaus

files.name: Tribute to Helgi - A Player Home
